title: Gold 4 to silver w/o overnight?
body: â€‹in placement me and my boyfriend won 5 lost 5 and we were placed togerher in gold 4 solo/duo. then we play rank flex. But today when I check my account, I saw my profile shows me in silver 1, my boyfriend still in gold 4. I never played league w/o my BF, and noone else used my account too. everything looks fine, except this display. It literally jump me from gold 4 to silver 1 one night w/o any games. we only play ranked game and we play it every day. It is not possible to explain this as unactivate player. Is this an error? could you explain this to me? Thank you!

replies.body:
Are you certain you're checking the ranked tier for the right queue? You have different ratings for different queues like Solo, Flex and 3v3's, so you'll want to ensure you're looking at the right rating for the right queue. You can change the view with the drop-down menu in the top-left of the corner.

Let me know if you have any questions.
